## ISendDIDCommMessageArgs interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

The input to the [IDIDComm.sendDIDCommMessage()](./did-comm.ididcomm.senddidcommmessage.md) method. The provided `messageId` will be used in the emitted event to allow event/message correlation.

This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface ISendDIDCommMessageArgs extends UsingResolutionOptions
```

**Extends:** [UsingResolutionOptions](./core-types.usingresolutionoptions.md)

## Properties

| Property                                                                      | Modifiers | Type                                                         | Description               |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------- |
| [messageId](./did-comm.isenddidcommmessageargs.messageid.md)                  |           | string                                                       | **_(BETA)_**              |
| [packedMessage](./did-comm.isenddidcommmessageargs.packedmessage.md)          |           | [IPackedDIDCommMessage](./did-comm.ipackeddidcommmessage.md) | **_(BETA)_**              |
| [recipientDidUrl](./did-comm.isenddidcommmessageargs.recipientdidurl.md)      |           | string                                                       | **_(BETA)_**              |
| [returnTransportId?](./did-comm.isenddidcommmessageargs.returntransportid.md) |           | string                                                       | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ |
